name: dragon-ecosystem-integrations
description: Integration tools for Dragon Ecosystem monitoring and analytics

scripts.deploy:monitoring: gcloud functions deploy monitorContracts --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --entry-point monitorContractsHttp --source google --env-vars-file ../.env.google --region $(grep GOOGLE_CLOUD_REGION ../.env.google | cut -d= -f2)
scripts.deploy:analytics: gcloud functions deploy processAnalytics --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-topic dragon-analytics --entry-point processEvent --source google --env-vars-file ../.env.google --region $(grep GOOGLE_CLOUD_REGION ../.env.google | cut -d= -f2)
scripts.deploy:dashboard: gcloud run deploy dragon-dashboard --source google --entry-point startDashboardServer --env-vars-file ../.env.google --region $(grep GOOGLE_CLOUD_REGION ../.env.google | cut -d= -f2) --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:monitoring && npm run deploy:analytics && npm run deploy:dashboard

author: Dragon Ecosystem Team
